akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3713. Transferred Editorial Notes Codification Section 3713 was editorially reclassified as section 30101 of Title 34, Crime Control and Law Enforcement.
Prior ProvisionsA prior section 3713, Pub. L. 90–351, title I, § 103, as added Pub. L. 96–157, § 2, Dec. 27, 1979, 93 Stat. 1170, provided for an Office of Community Anti-Crime Programs, prior to the general amendment of this subchapter by Pub. L. 98–473.
